name: Roro 's Breakout
description:
Hi everyone !

This is my second videogame project based on Breakout's game. Roro's Breakout has been inspired by my daughter, a little princess who enjoy candys, heart and pink, so i've made that game for her !

This is also why there is only one level and a simplified version of the classical Breakout ^^.

The game is in french for now, but i promise to you the next game i'll do will be in full english :) .

Controls:

Mouse for moving the pad

Left or Rightclick for launch the ball

Return for selecting a choice

Escape for returning to titlescreen at the controlscreen

Q for quit the game

Credits:

Graphics made by me.

OST: "Happy synths with Christmas feelings" from 3xBlast

Special thanks to my little girl who inspired me this game :)

If you enjoy my game, don't hesitate to post a comment and follow me :) .

The game has been made with Löve2D with the LUA language.
